channel.title: Make a Spearmint SDK to create mods for Spearmint
channel.description: What if someone wants to make a mod for Spearmint, or simply port over their old mod to Spearmint @zturtleman? Then said SDK would be a great tool for modmakers/mod ports. There's a lot of good mods I'd like to see on Spearmint.

item.title: Make a Spearmint SDK to create mods for Spearmint
item.dc:creator: @zturtleman ZTM
item.description:
@zturtleman wrote:

A post was split to a new topic: Programming three team CTF

Read full topic

item.title: Make a Spearmint SDK to create mods for Spearmint
item.dc:creator: @zturtleman ZTM
item.description:
@zturtleman wrote:

By Spearmint SDK I assume you mean the Spearmint Quake 3 and Team Arena mod code? That’s what mint-arena is. People can fork it.

Read full topic
item.source: Make a Spearmint SDK to create mods for Spearmint
